Articles.Content:
Maybe? OSX is BSD based, I think, which has roots in UNIX, like Linux.

The user below me has no idea who I am.

True. And no, OSX is not even close to Linux. Sure, it runs a somewhat similar kernel, but the entire point of Linux is that it's open source, and OSX is basically the current gold standard in the world of not being open source.

The user below me can see at least one windmill or landmark structure from their nearest window.

Actually I see two!

Emily Moor Mast and Castle Hill. Rep if you can guess where I live(Don't look at my profile)

I can post a pic if you want.

The user below me also playes paradox interactive games.

True. Cities in motion 2 and 1 last time.

The peson below me knows how to make a ssto

(Pls help me too!)

True. Four orange tanks around a single orange tank, launch with skippers on all orange tanks and a small probe core on top. Simple SSTO.

The user below me uses Steam.

NEVER! In all honesty l, I HATE steam.

The user below me has a youtube channel

True.

The user below me likes steam baths.

Do really hot showers count?

The person below me can hear me say "prepare to get underway, and you have watch at 2000" and know exactly what I'm trying to tell them.

nope..... no clue, will probly figure it out a year later and not know what page it was that I saw the question.

The user below me...... ermmmm..... is a moderator.... in disguise ?

I'll let you decide if, were I actually a moderator in disguise, I would tell you and blow my cover.

For the record, I'm not a moderator in disguise.

The user below me knows the eldrich secrets needed to convert mp4 files to mp3 on linux. (If you actually do please tell me because oh my god)

Nope. Handbrake maybe?

The user below me uses Linux.

Windows ftw.

The user below me used OS X.

Windows and Chrome OS.

The user below me dislikes olives.

True.

------------------------------.urT

False, you forget the ------------- at the end.

The user below me is a SPY!

"No."

The user below me has heard of Homestuck.

Indeed. I have only begun to understand it.

The user below me chants "ALL HAIL SBURB" all day, every day.

I'm too busy yelling TANSTAAFL constantly.

The person below me is a reincarnated Adolf Hitler, ready to throw every single goddamn Homestuck fan into a rebuilt Auschwitz. (If you are, I will happily join your Waffen SS.)

Erm.... no

The user below me has once before eaten a crazy concoction of food/drink that his/her friends dared him/her to eat/drink for money

Nope. But I have had a bacon milkshake before...

The user below me loves bacon, or the internet hates him/her.

BACON! F*** yeah! *sings the song*

The person below me wishes slower traffic would move to the right.

Oh hell yes.

The user below me has made a home-cooked meal for a date.

Ew... no!

The user below me plays terraria or minecraft.

I play Minecraft, I despise Terraria, my MC playtime has been diminished by the effects of extended KSP missions.
